channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 03:01 An alarm was sounded in the Zaporizhia region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 03:01 An alarm was sounded in the Zaporizhia region. Stay tuned for further messages. #행햟쮐햦향혧햨햟_쮏쐃햟혜혝혧 This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
